nodes.text: The Clantaani gunslinger Longo Two-Guns established the Longo Two-Guns Gang on the planet Tatooine by 32 BBY. The gang consisted mainly of Two-Guns's cousins and long-time associates, such as Radd Hardwikk and "Deadeye" Klintee. The group also included hired Nikto, Trandoshans, and Weequay. Two-Guns and his cronies operated in the Outer Rim, with activities in such locales as Mos Espa, Nal Hutta, and Mos Gamos. They made their living by raiding other criminal enterprises and stealing business from them, and by taking jobs from Gardulla the Hutt.
